thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: JoAnn

author: JoAnn
title: JoAnn
text:
I have bought Tag Mates for several years. Did you change the formula on the adhesive?
I feel that my newest labels fall off the clothes in the wash at a faster rate that the older labels. Some of my child's FIRST set of labels are STILL on her clothes while my most recent labels fall off. Kinda confusing.
Other than that, I love the label, the designs, the easy website and speedy turn around time.
